alert.note: Alert for New Madrid (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:12PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fulton and northeastern New Madrid Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 812 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hunter-Dawson State Historic Site, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Farrenburg. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 47 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
